DOC.brief_title: Neomycin Rifaximin Plus Neomycin Treating Methane Positive Constipation Predominant Irritable Bowel Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Rome III positive IBS subject ( 1875 year age ) Meet criterion constipation predominant IBS symptom include ≤ 3 complete spontaneous bowel movement per week hard lumpy stool . Presence detectable methane single breath sample ( ≥ 3ppm ) . If subject ≥ 50 year old , colonoscopy complete within past 5 year . Subjects history intestinal surgery ( except appendectomy cholecystectomy ) Recent antibiotic use ( within last 30 day ) Subjects know pelvic floor dysfunction Pregnancy Creatinine level > 1.4 Poorly controlled/uncontrolled significant medical condition would interfere study procedure Subjects hearing loss and/or tinnitus History bowel obstruction History celiac disease History inflammatory bowel disease Cirrhosis Diabetes
